#  Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers (2020)

![Georgi Zarkov, Radoslav
Minkov](https://s-cdn.phonearena.com//images/nothumb_user_300x300.png)

posted by Georgi Zarkov, Radoslav Minkov

Jul 13, 2020, 7:01 AM

![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==)
![](https://m-cdn.phonearena.com/images/article/99851-two_350/Best-portable-
wireless-Bluetooth-speakers-2020.jpg)

Bluetooth speakers are amazing devices! They range wildly in sizes, shapes,
colors and prices. With batteries that last many hours they're great to bring
on a camping trip or just to enjoy some music in your back yard. The market is
flooded with hundreds of models so picking one can overwhelming. That's why
we've selected the best portable Bluetooth speakers available right now and
separated them into three price categories. We have tiny speakers, small
speakers and even ones that can barely be called portable,

  

So, which Bluetooth speaker should you buy if you had to shop today? Let's
take a look at the pros and cons for each one of them right below.

  

## The best wireless Bluetooth speakers, a summarized list:

### Bluetooth speakers for $100 or less:

  * JBL Clip 3
  * UE Wonderboom 2
  * Bose Soundlink Micro
  * Tribit XSound Go
  * Anker Soundcore Flare 2

### Bluetooth speakers from $100 to $200:

  * [UE Boom 3](https://www.phonearena.com/cp/lsfarea.html#boom3)
  * JBL Flip 5
  * Beats Pill+
  * Bose SoundLink Mini 2
  * [UE Megaboom](https://www.phonearena.com/cp/lsfarea.html#megaboom)
  * Anker Soundcore Trance
  * Braven BRV-XL

### Bluetooth speakers for over $200:

  * Marshall Kilburn 2
  * JBL Boombox 2
  * Sonos Move
  * DiamondBoxx PA15

  

  

## Bluetooth speakers for $100 or less

  

### JBL Clip 3

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/358573-image/jbl-
clip-3.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 10 hours

  

The JBL Clip 3 is part of the ultra-portable Bluetooth speakers segment. It's
not powerful enough for a party at home, but you'll often see it hanging from
the backpack of someone rollerblading or snowboarding. Its IPX7 waterproof,
small, and has a built-in carabiner, making it the perfect companion for
outdoor activities.

  

Despite the compact body, this is still a JBL speaker, so expect to be
pleasantly surprised when you hear it for the first time.

  

[Buy JBL Clip 3 from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/2xAHycc)

[](https://amzn.to/2xWyUo7)

  

  

### UE Wonderboom 2

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/353526-image/UE-
Wonderboom-2.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 13 hours

  

Maybe more than anything, the Wonderboom 2 succeeds because of how reliable it
is. It can survive a drop up to five feet, will safely float rather than sink
to the bottom of a pool, and features like its multi-speaker mode are always
easily accessible, without forcing users to download an extra app: you just
take it with you, and the music follows. Plus, it just looks cute!

  

[Buy UE Wonderboom 2 from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/2YvgzJZ)

  

  

## Bose SoundLink Micro

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/358574-image/bose-
soundlink-micro.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 6 hours

  

Bose joins the small Bluetooth speaker fray with its SoundLink Micro. It also
comes with an IPX7 rating for water resistance and is light enough to be
clipped almost anywhere. Compared to the previous two speakers, however, the
battery life is a bit short and won't get you through a full day of hiking.
Still, it's a good choice for a compact Bluetooth speaker from a reputable
brand.

  

[Buy Bose Soundlink Micro from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/3fcnuhj)

[](https://amzn.to/2xfYEMj)

  

### Tribit XSound Go

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/353529-image/DOSS-
touch.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 24 hours

  

The Tribit XSound Go is undoubtedly inspired by the Beats Pill, but it comes
at a much lower price, making it very enticing. It's specs aren't shabby at
all, however! Two 6W drivers, waterproof just like the rest so far and a full
day of battery life if you're not cranking up the volume too much. But you
might want to do that since the XSound Go is managing to keep its sound
distortion-free even at higher volume levels. If you're looking for the
ultimate value Bluetooth speaker, the Tribit XSound Go is hard to beat.

  

[Buy Tribit XSound Go from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/2z6NpGE)

  

  

###

### Anker Soundcore Flare 2

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/358575-image/anker-
soundcore-flare-2.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 12 hours

  

Time for something affordable that can provide a bit more powerful sound.
Unlike the mini speakers, this one is designed with home parties in mind. It
provides a 360-degrees sound, has improved bass capabilities and even some
light effects at the base. You can pair tens of Flare 2 speakers to create an
all-encompassing audio experience. The battery life is on the shorter side
when it comes to Bluetooth speakers of that size, but it will get you through
the night no problem.

  

[Buy Anker Soundcore Flare 2 from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/2YwvvaY)

  

  

## Bluetooth speakers from $100 to $200

  

### UE Boom 3

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/353539-image/UE-
Boom-3.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 15 hours

  

The UE Boom 3 is another great option that is waterproof and shockproof. UE
puts its speakers through rigorous testing you you can take it anywhere
without much worry. While earlier, UE Boom speakers had support for Amazon's
Alexa voice assistant, it has now been revoked and this is just a regular
speaker focused on great sound quality, but without smart assistance commands.
In terms of sound quality, the UE Boom 3 is also excellent with crisp highs
and mids, and an overall surprisingly powerful sound for its size.

  

[Buy UE Boom 3 from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/3fir5KJ)

  

  

### JBL Flip 5

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/354058-image/P1520469.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 12 hours

  

The JBL Flip 5 is where great sound quality, cool design and great price meet.
It's the kind of speaker you'd be proud to whip out of your backpack and play
some music for your friends. Unlike most other speakers, the Flip 5 comes with
a Type C charging port which means you don't need to carry an extra cable and
can use your phone's charger (unless it's an iPhone, of course). It's also
just as durable as the best of them. Battery life is okay but not among the
best and and unlike the Flip 4 (which is also a good, slightly cheaper option)
it can't be used for calls.  

  

[Buy JBL Flip 5 from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/3dc7Y34)

  

  

###

### Beats Pill+

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/354059-image/P1520470.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 12 hours

  

Now here's something for the iPhone users of the world. Of course, the Beats
Pill+ can be paired with Android phones as well, but it charges through a
Lightning cable which makes it a lot more convenient for those part of the
Apple ecosystem. The Pill+ packs a punch despite what its design might
suggest. The sound is loud and clear and there's even a decent amount of bass
to go with it. Best of all, you don't have to pay a hefty premium for this
Beats product, the price of the Pill+ is in line with other products from its
class.

  

[Buy Beats Pill+ from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/2KX47Ll)

  

### Bose SoundLink Mini II

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/353542-image/bose-
soundlink-2.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 12 hours

  

The Bose SoundLink Mini 2 might have the most outdated look of them all, but
it has absolutely stellar sound quality that beats the JBL Charge 3 and UE
Boom 3 by a long shot. It has a more open sound stage, with much better
defined sound in both highs and lows, and it has sufficient volume to fill a
room nicely. It sounds exquisite, especially considering its rather small
size. Unfortunately, it's not the best partner for your outdoor activities as
it's lacking an IP rating.

  

[Buy Bose SoundLink Mini II from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/35woVm0)

  

  

### UE Megaboom 3

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/353557-image/UE-
Megaboom-3.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 20 hours

  

The UE Megaboom 3 is probably the most popular large Bluetooth speakers out
there and for a good reason: it blasts powerful 360-degree sound, allows
pairing two speakers to get even more boom and has a rock solid connection
that it can keep at distances of up to 150 feet. If the regular Boom 3 isn't
good enough for your purposes then the Megaboom 3 will surely be able to
deliver.

  

[Buy UE Megaboom 3 from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/3dkJTr3)

  

### Anker Soundcore Trance

  

![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)

Battery life: Up to 18 hours

  

The Soundcore Trance Bluetooth speaker is great for both house parties and
outdoor ones, due to its huge 101dB sound, waterproof design and beat-driven
LED lights. You can even use the Soundcore app to play party games involving
the speaker, boost the bass, and more.

  

[Buy Anker Soundcore Trance on Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/3iWTlEy)

  

  

### Braven BRV-XL

  

![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)

Battery life: Up to 16 hours

  

This Bluetooth speaker from Braven offers up to 16 hours of powerful (40W)
music, and can also serve as a power bank for your phone at the same time. The
Braven BRV-XL is rugged and waterproof, it even floats, so it's great for both
pool parties and camping trips. It has a convenient built-in handle, along
with an optional shoulder strap. As a hidden party bonus, this speaker even
comes with a built-in bottle opener.

  

[Buy Braven BRV-XL on Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/3fsejZU)

  

  

## Bluetooth speakers over $200

  

### Marshall Kilburn II

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/353558-image/marshall-
kilburn-2.jpg)

Battery life: 20+ hours

  

The stylish-looking Marshall Kilburn will look great in any home with the
recognizable Marshall design. But it's not just about the visual appeal as it
also boasts a very clear and loud sound output that will definitely have music
enthusiasts happy. And while it's bigger and heavier than most other speakers
on the list, it does have a strap to carry it around so you can take your
premium music experience anywhere and enjoy it for more than 20 hours. The
price tag is a step above what we've looked at so far, but if it's within your
budget, you won't regret getting the Kilburn II.

  

[Buy Marshall Kilburn II from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/2KUs9Xj)

  

  

### JBL Boombox 2

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/354060-image/P1520489.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 24 hours

  

With a boomy bass and an overall impressive sound quality, the large-sized JBL
Boombox 2 is one more great big Bluetooth speaker. All speakers on this list
can be used for an outdoor party but the Boombox 2 is probably the only one
that can do it without any compromises. To top it off, you can also use this
speaker's 10,000mAh battery as a power bank to charge up your phone.

  

[Buy JBL Boombox 2 from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/2CuOVEd)

  

  

### Sonos Move

  

[![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)](https://i-cdn.phonearena.com/images/articles/358590-image/sonos-
move.jpg)

Battery life: Up to 10 hours

  

The Sonos Move will fill your room or even garden with loud and balanced sound
that will impress your guests. The company's traditions in audio tech have
translated perfectly into this premium Bluetooth speaker and while it comes
with a hefty price tag, it also has a lot to offer. The clean design will fit
any contemporary living room nicely and if you need it somewhere else, just
pick it up from the charging stand and place it wherever you feel like.

  

[Buy Sonos Move from Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/2Sytbfz)

  

  

### DiamondBoxx PA15

  

![Best portable wireless Bluetooth speakers
\(2020\)](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==)

Battery life: Up to 40 hours

  

Are the local nightclubs closed? No problem, you can create your own at home
or anywhere else with the DiamondBoxx PA15. This giant 128dB Bluetooth speaker
is said to be among the most powerful ones you can buy. It's great for karaoke
and DJ-ing, and it even comes with a guitar amplifier. For streaming your
music, it supports Bluetooth, although you can also plug a USB stick or an SD
card into it. As arguably the ultimate Bluetooth speaker out there, it does
come with a heavy price to match its weight of 60 lbs.

  

[Buy the DiamondBoxx PA15 on Amazon.com](https://amzn.to/3066S44)
